hibernate-mapping.sql-query: insert into JXJ_PDJG_T(id,ksjxrlid,jsjxrlid,xsid,rxnfpc,bmid,zyid,bjid,zysftg,tysftg,cetsftg,sfqr) select seq_JXJ_PDJG_T.nextval,rl.SGXQ,rl.id,xs.id,xs.rxnfpc,xs.bmid,xs.yzyid,(select min(bj.id) from jcxx_bj_t bj, jcxx_bj_xs_t bjxs ,jcxx_zy_t zy where bjxs.bjid=bj.id and bjxs.xsid=xs.id and bj.zyid=zy.id and zy.zylbid=1),0,0,0,0 from xsxx_t xs,jxrl_t rl where xs.sfzx=1 and xs.sfzj=1 and xs.rxnfpc=:grade and rl.id=:toSemesterId and not exists(select * from JXJ_PDJG_T jg where jg.xsid=xs.id and jg.jsjxrlid=rl.id)

select jg.id jgid,bdxx.rxny rxnfpc,bdxx.bmid bmid,bdxx.zyid zyid,bdxx.bjid bjid from xs_xjyd_t xjyd,xs_xjyd_bdxx_t bdxx,jxj_pdjg_t jg where xjyd.bdqid=bdxx.id and xjyd.bdqsrq > :lastDay and not exists(select * from xs_xjyd_t xjyd2 where xjyd2.xsid=xjyd.xsid and xjyd2.bdqsrq > xjyd.bdqsrq) and jg.ksjxrlid = :fromSemesterId and jg.jsjxrlid=:toSemesterId and jg.xsid=xjyd.xsid

insert into JXJ_PDJG_T(id,ksjxrlid,jsjxrlid,xsid,rxnfpc,bmid,zyid,bjid,zysftg,tysftg,cetsftg,sfqr)
select seq_JXJ_PDJG_T.nextval,rl.sgxq,rl.id,xs.id,bdqxx.rxny rxnfpc ,bdqxx.bmid,bdqxx.zyid,bdqxx.bjid,0,0,0,0 from xsxx_t xs,xs_xjyd_t xjyd,xs_xjyd_bdxx_t bdqxx,jxrl_t rl where xs.sfzx=0 and xs.sfzj=1 and xjyd.xsid=xs.id and bdqxx.rxny=:grade and bdqxx.id= xjyd.bdqid and bdqxx.sfzx=1 and xjyd.bdqsrq > rl.jzsj and exists(select * from xs_xjyd_bdxx_t bdhxx where bdhxx.id= xjyd.bdhid and bdhxx.sfzx=0) and not exists(select * from xs_xjyd_t xjyd2 where xjyd2.xsid=xjyd.xsid and xjyd2.bdqsrq > xjyd.bdqsrq) and not exists(select * from JXJ_PDJG_T jg where jg.xsid=xs.id and jg.jsjxrlid=rl.id) and rl.id=:toSemesterId
